    pycheron.UI.createDashUI module¶

    pycheron.UI.createHTML module¶

    create_main_html(dirpath, pycherondir, outpath)[source]¶

    Creates main html page with QC summary information

    :param dirpath (str) - directory path where Pycheron output was written, should be for a specific network

    :param pycherondir (st) - directory path where Pycheron lives

    Returns:qc.html file in directory executing the script
    create_PSDPDFs_html(dirpath, mo_yr, outpath)[source]¶

    Creates PSDPDFs html pages for each station within a given network

    :param dirpath (str) - directory path where Pycheron output was written, should be for a specific network

    :param mo_yr (str) - month-year or week-year that PSDs were run for

    Returns:returns $sta-PSDPDFs.html for each station in the current working directory
    create_ranking_htmls(dirpath, rank_list, outpath)[source]¶

    Creates ranking html page for a network

    :param dirpath (str) - directory path where Pycheron output was written, should be for a specific network

    :param rank_list (list) - list of

    Returns:returns ranking.html for a network in the current working directory
